name: Overcrafted (Dinodyr)
description:
Save your base with handcrafted weapons in this Overcooked plus Plants vs. Zombies mashup! Game submission for Game Jam Magalu!

Controls:

W, S, A, D - Movement
E - Interact (craft items, pickup and place materials)

RECIPES:

- Bow: 2 woods, 1 string (2.0 sec crafting)
- Sword: 1 wood, 1 string, 1 iron (4.0 sec crafting, low range)
- Gun: 1 wood, 1 iron, 1 gunpowder (8.0 sec crafting)
- Cannon:  1 iron, 3 gunpowder (14.0 sec crafting, area damage)

How to play:

Pick up resources on the left (wood, string, iron, gunpowder) and craft weapons (bow, gun, sword, rocket launcher) at the station. Place materials on the red counter accordingly to the recipe you want to make. After crafting the weapon, place it on the counter leftmost of your desired lane, which your guard will pick it up and fire.

Weapons have different stats and ammo. If ammo gets to 0, your guard loses his weapon and you have to craft another one.

Reach 300 enemies spawned to win!

Music:  Blacksmith by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
